summary: Michel is a young technician in the fledgling TV industry and is due for military service in two months at the time of the Algerian War. Juliette and Liliane are inseparable best friends, ... See full summary »
cast: Jean-Claude Aimini|Daniel Descamps|Stefania Sabatini|Yveline Céry|Vittorio Caprioli|David Tonelli|Annie Markhan|André Tarroux|Christian Longuet|Michel Soyet|Arlette Gilbert|Maurice Garrel|Jeanne Pérez|Charles Lavialle|Patricia Andrieux|Edmond Ardisson|Olivia Cletienne|Albert Benamou|Chouquette Deschamps|Pietro Cortini|Mitzi Hahn|Alain Douchin|Reine Marvanne|Pierre Frag|Marianne Padovani|Charles Lucciardi|Michèle Padovani|Jean Lucchetti|Lulu|Nadine Staquet|José Pantieri|Marco Perrin|Maxime Saury|Dominique Tozza|Christiane Legrand|Rudo Cardi|Maguy Zanni|Les Fils du Ciel|Jean-Christophe Averty|Jean-Claude Brialy|Michel Galabru|Robert Hirsch|Stellio Lorenzi|Michel Piccoli
title: Adieu Philippine
